Kural_Info.Chapter: அவையறிதல் (The Knowledge of the Council Chamber)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நன்றென்ற வற்றுள்ளும் நன்றே முதுவருள்முந்து கிளவாச் செறிவு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The modesty by which one does not rush forward and speak in (an assembly of) superiors is the best among all (one's) good qualities.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A young, brilliant scholar is present in a council of aged, venerable elders ('முதுவர்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Though the young scholar clearly knows the answer to a question being debated, they practice restraint and modesty ('செறிவு'). They hold their tongue, not speaking before their elders ('முந்து கிளவா'). This act of restraint is visualized as a beautiful, glowing gem of humility forming in their heart.
Layered_Composition.Background: All the other good qualities of the scholar—their intelligence, their eloquence, their knowledge—are shown as smaller, orbiting lights. The central, brightest gem is the humility of knowing when to remain silent. This is the 'best of all good things' ('நன்றென்றவற்றுள்ளும் நன்றே').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Among all good qualities, the best is the disciplined modesty of not speaking before one's elders and superiors.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The hierarchy of virtues, with the 'gem of humble silence' being the largest and brightest, is the key visual. The young scholar's expression should be one of respectful restraint, not frustration.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A calm, respectful, and scholarly light fills the scene. The gem of humility in the young scholar's heart glows with a soft but powerful white light, outshining their other intellectual gifts.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A medium close-up on the young scholar, capturing their expression of respectful silence, with a symbolic view of the hierarchy of virtues within their heart.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a focus on subtle emotional expression.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The primary light source is the 'gem of humility', signifying it as the highest virtue.

Cultural_Anchors: The discipline of not speaking first (முந்து கிளவாச் செறிவு)

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: young person interrupting, angry elders, text artifacts, prideful expression.
